alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 11:16PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wichita and southeastern Logan Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1115 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Leoti, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wichita and southeastern Logan Counties, including the following locations... Marienthal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
